Subject: Enter: The Opposite Twins
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Windows AOL sub 125
From: Rudra656@...

::Mu/Nu::
    Two stasis pods land in separate areas of the Earth.  They scan and both 
select squirrels as their beast modes.  One black and one white.  One good 
one evil.  The warriors emerge and begin walking.  They are armed with small 
blasters capable of emitting a blade for close combat.  They are both 
sharpshooters by nature and by trade.  One has used his skills to become an 
assassin.  The other, an officer of the law.  They are twins who have never 
met.  They have been hunting each other since the day they were created.  One 
will stop only to aid in a war.  The other, only for the promise of power.
